com.salesmanager.core.business.services.content

Interface ContentService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SalesManagerEntityService<java.lang.Long,com.salesmanager.core.model.content.Content>, TransactionalAspectAwareService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContentServiceImpl

    public interface ContentService
extends SalesManagerEntityService<java.lang.Long,com.salesmanager.core.model.content.Content>
    Interface defining methods responsible for CMSContentService. ContentServive will be be entry point for CMS and take care of following functionalities.
  • Adding,removing Content images for given merchant store
  • Get,Save,Update Content data for given merchant store
Author:
Umesh Awasthhi

        void addContentFile(java.lang.String merchantStoreCode,
                    com.salesmanager.core.model.content.InputContentFile contentFile)

        Method responsible for storing content file for given Store.Files for given merchant store will be stored in Infinispan.
        Parameters:
        merchantStoreCode - merchant store whose content images are being saved.
        contentFile - content image being stored

        com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException

                com.salesmanager.core.model.content.FileContentType fileContentType,
                java.lang.String fileName)
         throws com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException
        Method to remove given content image.Images are stored in underlying system based on there name. Name will be used to search given image for removal

        imageContentType -
        imageName -
        merchantStoreCode - merchant store code

        com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException

      • getContentFile

        com.salesmanager.core.model.content.OutputContentFile getContentFile(java.lang.String merchantStoreCode,
                                                                     com.salesmanager.core.model.content.FileContentType fileContentType,
                                                                     java.lang.String fileName)
                                                              throws com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException
        Method responsible for fetching particular content image for a given merchant store. Requested image will be search in Infinispan tree cache and OutputContentImage will be sent, in case no image is found null will returned.
        Parameters:
        merchantStoreCode -
        imageName -
        Returns:
        OutputContentImage
        Throws:
        com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException
